title: A Conversation with Jawaharlal Nehru and Chester Bowles
creator_credit: Robert D. Graff and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: The Prime Minister of India, statesman and leader of the awakening nations of Asia - discusses his career and world events with Chester Bowles, former US Ambassador to India. He describes his early life, his friendship with Gandhi, and the fight for freedom. he also expresses his views on the problems India was facing in the 1960’s.
